title: HOW TO CLIMB OUT OF YOUR SHTHOLE RANK
body:
Pick a tank champ, master it, make plays and win. Seriously. Everyone wants to be the carry. Everyone thinks their yasuo skillz are beast. No. 

Be the front man, lead, and let the kids who have actual raw mechanical talent do their shit. Be Dak Prescott, pass the ball to Dez and let him do the rest. 

If you ask me for a preference, I will say Shen. Shen's my boy. He's tanky, complex and can be appreciated in just about any time of situation. Not a minute of boredom.

I come on here to read whiny posts when I'm bored, and I'm not disappointed.
